entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installed .NET 6.0 SDKs not showing with dotnet --info or dotnet --list-sdks and commands depeding on SDK fail (Linux/Ubuntu) #27129

PullRequests

Created

  • Support custom rule settings, improve testability #27138
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Migrated to newest version of `FluentAssertions`; removed duplicate code in templating #27132

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1940170 #27123
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj, Solutions #26808
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • Backport Razor Static Web Assets Manifest Path Changes #27108
    Area-AspNetCore, 6.0.4xx
  • Fix for --print-download-link only #27064
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • add rule for detecting attribute differences #26891
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Parser for actual msbuild property syntax #27086
    Bug, Area-CLI
  • Update handling of SelfContained and RuntimeIdentifier properties when specified on the command line #21986
    Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #27071
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update minimum msbuild for RC1 #26872
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cleanup yaml #27105
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle error when status runtime information cannot find version in productCollection. #26676
    Area-Infrastructure
